trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Services REST API Reference
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Services REST API Reference

trans-unit.source: <token>firstref_zumo</token> is a <token>azure_2</token> service offering designed to make it easy to create highly-functional mobile apps using <token>azure_2</token>.
trans-unit.target: <token>firstref_zumo</token> is a <token>azure_2</token> service offering designed to make it easy to create highly-functional mobile apps using <token>azure_2</token>.

trans-unit.source: <token>nextref_zumo</token> brings together a set of <token>azure_2</token> services that enable backend capabilities for mobile apps.
trans-unit.target: <token>nextref_zumo</token> brings together a set of <token>azure_2</token> services that enable backend capabilities for mobile apps.

trans-unit.source: <token>nextref_zumo</token> provides a set of REST APIs that are used to access and change table data and retrieve authenticated login information.
trans-unit.target: <token>nextref_zumo</token> provides a set of REST APIs that are used to access and change table data and retrieve authenticated login information.

trans-unit.source: This reference provides general information for working with storage service APIs, as well as specific reference information for each available operation.
trans-unit.target: This reference provides general information for working with storage service APIs, as well as specific reference information for each available operation.

trans-unit.source: The API includes the operations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: The API includes the operations listed in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Requests an authentication token from <token>nextref_zumo</token> by using an identity token already obtained from an identity provider.
trans-unit.target: Requests an authentication token from <token>nextref_zumo</token> by using an identity token already obtained from an identity provider.

trans-unit.source: Requests that <token>nextref_zumo</token> initiate authentication using a specific identity provider.
trans-unit.target: Requests that <token>nextref_zumo</token> initiate authentication using a specific identity provider.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new record into a table.
trans-unit.target: Inserts a new record into a table.

trans-unit.source: Updates an existing record in a table.
trans-unit.target: Updates an existing record in a table.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an existing record from a table.
trans-unit.target: Deletes an existing record from a table.
